qa_pairs.question: What time is it there, sir?
qa_pairs.answer: It's six o'clock, six p.m.

qa_pairs.question: Maybe at some point, something like a Sigma, what is it called? Sigma Explorer HQ?
qa_pairs.answer: SigmaSpace.

qa_pairs.question: Is that the Rosen team that was working on that or still kind of slow burning that?
qa_pairs.answer: I think it was Rosen plus Splash.

qa_pairs.question: Is it on your main page?
qa_pairs.answer: VoltPay.Store.store.

qa_pairs.question: So what are you using? So VoltPay.Store is your, this is your code right here, but what are you hooking up to and integrating with?
qa_pairs.answer: I'm working with Trocador, which is actually known in the community from around six to seven years in all the crypto industry. So they have a very good reputation. And then we use a swapper, exotics, and multiple providers in a backend, which basically do the swapping for you.

qa_pairs.question: There's no, there's KYC when you buy with currency though, correct? Was that the deal? I think it blocks me in the US, I think, or in New York state. If you're buying with crypto, no? No, if you're buying with cash, I mean with credit card.
qa_pairs.answer: There is no option to buy with credit card. If you're getting a prepaid card and you are not allowed, there are several countries which are not allowed to get a prepaid card, because they won't work there. But the USA one is working. So you are basically getting a swipe card. And you can use that anywhere.

qa_pairs.question: Can you hear us?
qa_pairs.answer: Yeah, can you hear me?

qa_pairs.question: You guys know what this is? You guys paying attention to this HQ?
qa_pairs.answer: If you want to read it and read the complete smart contract, I would be glad. Because I think they just copied and pasted the chat GPT, and that's it.

qa_pairs.question: What is this thing they're working on?
qa_pairs.answer: Actually, I didn't read it because I saw the chat GPT. Would you like to modify this somehow? And I was like, OK, so that's like.

qa_pairs.question: Anything else you're working on, HQ?
qa_pairs.answer: No, I would like to just shout out to Michael because he's doing some nice PRs and he's learning how to be a dev.

qa_pairs.question: What's he PRing on? What's he doing?
qa_pairs.answer: He's doing stuff on crux. He added top trading. He is working on front end now. He's working on APIs. So yeah, I just want him to see that how painful it can be sometimes.

qa_pairs.question: What kind of like your own wallet?
qa_pairs.answer: Yeah. It is like a dApp. It's a dApp, but which acts like wallet. So you can create an wallet. You can send transactions through it. You can send money to send tokens to others. And it will have the integration of all the mew apps in it.

qa_pairs.question: When's that going to come out?
qa_pairs.answer: I don't plan to release anything for now. I think I have released a lot. And I want to see some adoption to those things first, because I'm just burning myself here.

qa_pairs.question: Is Stealth Exchange same as Stealth, whatever did you just say?
qa_pairs.answer: I do. I do. VoltPay.Store uses them as one of the providers.

qa_pairs.question: And BankX isn't? Banksa isn't? I bet this is very centralized.
qa_pairs.answer: Yes, it is not centralized. It is like military protocol. They ask you for how many moles do you have on your left leg and then your right leg also.

qa_pairs.question: Do you use this feature? Do you have this turned on in your Nautilus HQ?
qa_pairs.answer: Yeah, by default.

qa_pairs.question: What did you do with the Mew? Did you vault that Mew that I sent you, HQ?
qa_pairs.answer: I think I locked it and I unlocked it. And now I think those 15K Mew will be distributed to all the top in the leaderboard for the runes and DEX campaigns we created.

qa_pairs.question: This is Echo? Yeah. You didn't build this for Echo?
qa_pairs.answer: No, I just gave him the emotional support.

qa_pairs.question: Do you have a live page of the bank? You should have a live page of the bank.
qa_pairs.answer: I think it is. Yeah, it is ErgoCentra.MewFinance.com. It is live and it is updated and you can already send messages to Ergo Santa. You can write your letters.

qa_pairs.question: You want that HQ?
qa_pairs.answer: No, thank you. That dance is very smelly right now. It's been two years, I think.

qa_pairs.question: Are you guys splitting that up this time? So if there were, I don't know, 200 keys, you're just taking whatever the token value is dividing by 200 or somebody getting.
qa_pairs.answer: No, I think, I think we're just, we're not sending any keys this time. It will be a DEX campaign. So we will be set up, set up multiple DEX campaign based on tokens. So for example, if we have a lot of FAKU, so we can create a campaign on FAKU.

qa_pairs.question: What's the name of it, you guys remember?
qa_pairs.answer: It's Vlad Kostya.
